website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak EasyShare Picture Viewer makes for a slick, cheap digital brag book.
cons: Thumbnails display a little sluggishly in multiup mode

customer_reviews.title: ... was a camera it it’s not I would not recommend anyone buy this
customer_reviews.text: It’s too small on my thought it was a camera it it’s not I would not recommend anyone buy this
customer_reviews.author: marsheila smith

customer_reviews.title: Digital Brag Book
customer_reviews.text: My dad can't get the hang of transfering photos but my husband loves his. It did replace my old Kodak software with the newere version that came with it. I prefere the older version. IT is much easier to install the software on a computer without existing Kodak software. Yes, you must mark the photos as favorites to transfer but it is really simple from there. The photos are crisp and clear so far as we only have about 20 trasnferrred. HIghly recommended toreplace the old brag book and bent envelope!
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: easyshare?
customer_reviews.text: I was neve able to get pictures into the machine as per their instructons, I got around that by getting a memory card and loading the pictures directly into that, then inserting the card in the viewer, thus increasing the capacity as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kodak easy share picture viewer
customer_reviews.text: Kodak easy share picture viewer, like how fast arrived and well packed. It is working great. I love it! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Luz Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of complicating at first to figure out how to download the pictures in the picture viewer. When we finally figured it out the pictures looked wonderful. You just have to have patience with it.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would turn on but would do nothing else. It would not read SD cards.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Picture Viewer
customer_reviews.text: The product was difficult to use. Pictures failed to stay in order and transferring them from computer to the viewer proved impossible for me. I must commend the seller though because he made every effort to help me solve my problems and then arranged for a refund when I was unable to conquer the product.
customer_reviews.author: Everett M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Small viewing area
customer_reviews.text: This product has a small viewing area and doesn't seem to stay charged very long. It works good to carry in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear 2

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge waste of money, did not work correctly, disc for downloading software did not work and Kodak would not replace it due it being severely out of date.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little compact viewer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife to show off our snapshots. It does the trick. It is relatively simple, compact, lightweight, and picture display quality is quite good, though 2.5" is just barely big enough. A similar unit with a 4 inch display would be welcome. It reads SD cards without problems. Transferring photos with the Kodak easyshare software isn't easy. There should be a provision to just copy the files rather than messing around with "favorites", "albums", etc. We just copy the pictures directly onto the card and transfer the card from computer to viewer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Great for setting or changing the mood but instructions are poor
customer_reviews.text: What a great alternative to fishing through boxes of photos when you want to re-visit memories. It took me about an hour to get it to work because I am not great with this kind of thing This is a fun little item. It functions well once you get comfortable with running it. The instructions were very poor however, it should have only taken 5 minutes to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Chodor

customer_reviews.title: good product--terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The picture viewer is a fun way to carry lots of digital pictures in a small device. However, setting it up and loading it was a nightmare. I spent hours writing to tech support and ultimately on the phone to figure out how to move the pictures from my computer to the device.
customer_reviews.author: sue322

customer_reviews.title: Picture Viewer
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoy this picviewer. It can really fast and it's so easy to program. I plan to use it when my family goes bowling next month. The pictures you view come out very sharp and clear. I would recommend it to everyone. Thank you Amazon for getting it to me before my due date for delivery. I would buy from you all again.
customer_reviews.author: AJCraw

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these items to see how well it would work with pictures of the kids for grandma and grandpa. It was easy to use, holds a lot of pics, nice picture quality, and convenient in size. We liked it so much we bought 2 more - 1 for an uncle living in another state and 1 for my wife to keep in her purse. Well worth the money for not having traditional pictures getting ruined in your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The EasyShare Picture Viewer has proven to be so useful. I just take my pictures, remove the card from the camera and pop it into my EasyShare. People I hand it to review my pictures always ask about where to get one. It's small, so it easily fits in my purse. Think I know what I'm giving for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Ickes

customer_reviews.title: Where's the instructions?
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little item. It works easily once you firure it out. However, there are no meaningful instructions. When I called customer support, they couldn't figure out why there are heardly any instructions. It took me several hours to get it to work. Mind you, I'm no tekkie, but many grandparents, who would love it, would never figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Garbell

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and dependable service
customer_reviews.text: I already own this product and this purchase was for a Christmas gift. I had been searching and was not able to find it until I checked with Amazon.com. Once I placed my order, it arrived in perfect condition and I was so happy to have found it. Thank you for your prompt service. Sincerely, R Floura
customer_reviews.author: R. Floura

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Picture Viewer --- GREAT new product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a trip to China. Shared with friends using my memory card--then, transferred best images to the internal memory. Easy to use. Love the size and id of device. Also, shared the trip with others by docking the viewer on my camera dock and displaying the slide show on TV.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: waste of time
customer_reviews.text: 1. 6 hours personal time 2. 2 hours computer tech time 3. 3 hours Kodak tech time (phone) 4. Still would not export or import pictures (probably a driver problem) 5. Kodak had a great idea, but failed in making it practical and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Picture Viewer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Mother and she absolutely loves it! Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Manda4158

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare Picture Viewer
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Keep your digital pictures close with the Kodak Easyshare Picture Viewer--small enough to put in your pocket or purse; large enough to carry life's biggest memories. 

 Simple to Share. Anytime. Anywhere.


 * Carry your memories with you--the small, credit-card size makes it simple 
 * Share and relive your most treasured memories quickly and easily on its large 2.5-inch high-resolution display 

 Your digital photo album


 * Magnify pictures 2x for a close-up view 
 * Store over 150 of your favorite pictures 
 * View even more pictures using its expandable SD/MMC slot 
 * Update your favorites collection effortlessly--the picture viewer is compatible with the Kodak Easyshare System 

 Print the perfect picture


 * Use the exclusive Share button to print real Kodak 4-by-6-inch pictures on the Kodak Easyshare Printer Dock Series 3 
 * Also compatible with the Kodak Easyshare Camera Dock Series 3 

 What's in the Box:
Kodak Easyshare Picture Viewer, Kodak Easyshare software, protective case, USB cable, custom dock insert, welcome kit.
feature_bullets: Credit-card size picture viewer small enough to put in pocket or purse
32 MB internal memory stores over 150 pictures
Easily print out photos with Printer Dock Series 3 (not included)
